text: Agdistis sissia is a moth in the family Pterophoridae. It is known from Turkey, Armenia, Turkmenistan, Azerbaijan and Iran.A new species, a new synonym, and new distribution records in the genus Agdistis Hübner, 1825 from Iran (Pterophoridae: Agdistinae) ==References== Category:Agdistinae Category:Moths described in 1987
title: Agdistis sissia
